Verses: 1 appozhudhu Mose: Avargal Ennai Nambaargal; En Vaakkukkuch Sevikodaargal; Karththar Unakkuth Dharisanamaagavillai Endru Solluvaargal Endraan.
2 karththar Avanai Nokki: Un Kaiyilirukkiradhu Enna Endraar. Oru Kol Endraan.
3 adhaith Tharaiyile Podu Endraar; Avan Adhaith Tharaiyile Pottapodhu, Adhu Sarppamaayitru; Mose Adharku Vilagi Odinaan.
4 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Un Kaiyai Neetti, Adhin Vaalaip Pidi Endraar; Avan Than Kaiyai Neetti, Adhaip Pidiththapodhu, Adhu Avan Kaiyile Kolaayitru.
5 aabiragaamin Dhevanum Eesaakkin Dhevanum Yaakkobin Dhevanumaayirukkira Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuth Dharisanamaanadhai Avargal Nambuvadharku Idhuve Adaiyaalam Endraar.

6 melum, Karththar Avanai Nokki: Un Kaiyai Un Madiyile Podu Endraar; Avan Than Kaiyaith Than Madiyile Pottu, Adhai Veliye Edukkumbodhu, Idho, Avan Kai Uraindha Mazhaiyaippola Venkushtam Pidiththirundhadhu.

7 avar: Un Kaiyaith Thirumbavum Un Madiyile Podu Endraar. Avan Than Kaiyaith Thirumbath Than Madiyile Pottu, Than Madiyilirundhu Adhai Veliye Eduththapodhu, Adhu Thirumba Avanudaiya Matrach Sadhaiyaip Polaayitru.
8 appozhudhu Avar: Mundhina Adaiyaalaththai Avargal Kandu, Unnai Nambaamalum Unakkuch Sevikodaamalum Ponaal, Pindhina Adaiyaalaththaik Kandu Nambuvaargal.

9 ivvirandu Adaiyaalangalaiyum Avargal Nambaamalum, Un Vaakkukkuch Sevikodaamalum Iruppaargalaanaal, Appozhudhu Nee Nadhiyin Thanneerai Mondu Nilaththil Ootruvaayaaga; Nadhiyil Monda Thanneer Vettaandharaiyile Iraththamaagum Endraar.
10 appozhudhu Mose Karththarai Nokki: Aandavare, Idharku Munnaavadhu, Dhevareer Umadhu Adiyaanode Pesinadharkup Pinnaavadhu Naan Vaakkuvallavan Alla; Naan Thikkuvaayum Mandha Naavum Ullavan Endraan.
11 appozhudhu Karththar Avanai Nokki: Manushanukku Vaayai Undaakkinavar Yaar? Oomaiyanaiyum Sevidanaiyum Paarvaiyullavanaiyum Kurudanaiyum Undaakkinavar Yaar? Karththaraagiya Naan Allavaa?
12 aadhalaal, Nee Po; Naan Un Vaayode Irundhu, Nee Pesavendiyadhai Unakkup Podhippen Endraar.
13 adharku Avan: Aandavare, Neer Anuppach Siththamaayirukkira Yaaraiyaagilum Anuppum Endraan.

14 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyin Mel Kobamoondavaraagi: Leviyanaagiya Aaron Un Sagodharan Allavaa? Avan Nandraaip Pesugiravan Endru Ariven; Avan Unnaich Sandhikkap Purappattu Varugiraan; Unnaik Kaanumbodhu Avan Irudhayam Magizhum.
15 nee Avanode Pesi, Avan Vaayil Vaarththaigalaip Podu; Naan Un Vaayilum Avan Vaayilum Irundhu, Neengal Seyya Vendiyadhai Ungalukku Unarththuven.
16 avan Unakkup Padhilaaga Janangalode Pesuvaan; Ivvidhamaai Avan Unakku Vaayaaga Iruppaan; Nee Avanukkuth Dhevanaaga Iruppaai.
17 indhak Kolaiyum Un Kaiyile Pidiththukkondupo, Idhanaal Nee Adaiyaalangalaich Seyvaai Endraar.

18 mose Than Maamanaagiya Eththirovinidaththukku Vandhu: Naan Egipthilirukkira En Sagodhararidaththukkuth Thirumbippoi, Avargal Innum Uyirode Irukkiraargalaa Endru Paarkkumbatip Purappattuppoga Uththaravu Tharavendum Endraan. Appozhudhu Eththiro Moseyai Nokki: Sugamaaip Poivaarum Endraan.
19 pinnum Karththar Meedhiyaanile Moseyai Nokki: Nee Egipthukkuth Thirumbip Po, Un Piraananai Vaangaththedina Manidhar Ellaarum Irandhu Ponaargal Endraar.
20 appozhudhu Mose Than Manaiviyaiyum Than Pillaigalaiyum Kazhudhaiyin Mel Etrikkondu, Egipthu Dhesaththukkuth Thirumbinaan; Dhevanudaiya Kolaiyum Mose Than Kaiyile Pidiththukkonduponaan.

21 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Egipthile Thirumbippoich Serndhapin, Naan Un Kaiyil Aliththirukkira Arpudhangal Yaavaiyum Paarvonukku Munbaagach Seyyumbadi Echcharikkaiyaayiru; Aagilum, Naan Avan Irudhayaththaik Kadinappaduththuven; Avan Janaththaip Pogavidaan.
22 appozhudhu Nee Paarvonode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Isravel Ennudaiya Kumaaran, En Seshtapuththiran.

23 enakku Aaraadhanai Seyyumbadi En Kumaaranai Anuppividu Endru Kattalaiyidugiren; Avanai Vidamaatten Enbaayaagil Naan Unnudaiya Kumaaranai, Un Seshtapuththiranaich Sangarippen Endru Karththar Sonnaar Endru Sol Endraar.
24 vazhiyile Thangum Idaththil Karththar Avanukku Edhirppattu, Avanaik Kollappaarththaar.
25 appozhudhu Sipporaal Karukkaana Oru Kallai Eduththu, Than Puththiranudaiya Nuniththolai Aruththu, Adhai Avan Kaalgalukku Munbaaga Erindhu: Neer Enakku Iraththa Sambandhamaana Purushan Endraal.
26 pinbu Avar Avanaivittu Vilaginaar. Appozhudhu Aval: Viruththasedhanaththinimiththam Neer Enakku Iraththa Sambandhamaana Purushan Endraal.
27 karththar Aaronai Nokki: Nee Vanaandharaththil Mosekku Edhirkondupo Endraar. Avan Poi, Dhevaparvadhaththil Avanaich Sandhiththu, Avanai Muththamseydhaan.
28 appozhudhu Mose Thannai Anuppina Karththarudaiya Sagala Vaarththaigalaiyum Avar Thanakkuk Kattalaiyitta Sagala Adaiyaalangalaiyum Aaronukkuth Theriviththaan.
29 moseyum Aaronum Poi, Isravel Puththirarin Mooppar Ellaaraiyum Koodivarach Seydhaargal.
30 karththar Mosekkuch Solliya Sagala Vaarththaigalaiyum Aaron Solli, Janangalin Kangalukku Munbaaga Andha Adaiyaalangalaiyum Seydhaan.

31 janangal Visuvaasiththaargal; Karththar Isravel Puththiraraich Sandhiththaar Endrum, Avargal Padum Ubaththiravangalaik Kannokkippaarththaar Endrum, Avargal Kettapodhu, Thalaikunindhuth Thozhudhukondaargal.
